transcript.title: Interview with Justin Smith and Tim Lane, Fairfax Radio Network
transcript.content:

JUSTIN SMITH:

He grew up on the land and he loved the land, he loved his cattle and I suppose, again, there was just this deep resonance between him and his life and the community from which he came.

JUSTIN SMITH:

Prime Minister, again, thank you very much for taking the time to talk to us before the service.
